column4: hi, I just installed 6.10 (had problems getting 7.04 installed) and the HD won't boot. I can only get the Live CD to boot. I did "find /boot/grub/stage1" "root (hd0,0)" and "setup (hd0)" from the live disk and it won't  boot.  Any ideas?  THanks for all help in advance!
!grub
that does not help at all sorry
I am asking a question that I have a feeling not very many people here know how to do if any /
->What is your question?
I didn't see it
I was issuing that for my own benefit
no problem I was asking about grub just letting you know incase it was directed at me
What is your question?  I am having war with it as well

hi, I just installed 6.10 (had problems getting 7.04 installed) and the HD won't boot. I can only get the Live CD to boot. I did "find /boot/grub/stage1" "root (hd0,0)" and "setup (hd0)" from the live disk and it won't  boot.  Any ideas?  THanks for all help in advance!
that is my issue, what is yours?
raid grub and a multitude of crazyness
Ouch, not done much with raid, so I can't help much
Sorry :)
nobody with ubuntu has it seems :)
raid is taboo with ubuntu!
it slides, it dices, it makes juliene fries, but it won't do raid
well raid is very nice :)
every other distro I have worked with is butter but ubuntu is crap
Seems like there are no "perfect" or "excellent" Linux Distros

key word "was"
